title: do we consider pes a tier 2 college
content:
title
in the grand scheme of things, it doesn't really matter but it would help to know what my fellow pesticides think

comments.body: I'll give you my take, if you're a tier 1 student, pes is a tier 1 college, very high paying jobs for you if you're smart enough here to beat the competition, and it's a t2 college if you're a tier 2 students and so on. You get the point
I asked chat gpt in past, it said pesu was t2.
Id say tier 2, it's in the likes of RV, BMS
All these tiers were created by us. All *tier* things are in our mind

IIT Bangalore, tier 2 clg? Don't forget we are competing with Stanford
/s
IIT Bangalore is soon to be ive- league yaar /s

time for you to leave this subReddit through
 the racoon doorðŸ˜¤

Bruh are u students of pesu??ðŸ’€?? Imma bet u guys know more bout pesu than gpt, cuz gpt answers only on the data fed to it, if lotta people say pesu is tier 1 (online) then it gonna report pesu is tier 1, but it might also be incorrect, so find some vaild source
My question is if I take EC in ring road campus can I get into cs from second year if I score good in sem cgpa..???
